subject: Murders and Attempted Murders
Football
lead_paragraph: The suspected shooter in the murder of the Washington Redskins star Sean Taylor told the police that he and the other suspects burned their clothes in an attempt to cover up the crime. The statement by Eric Rivera Jr., 17, and those by two other suspects were released by prosecutors in Florida. All three statements were heavily redacted on a judge’s orders and do not contain outright confessions to the crime. But there are hints throughout of what happened and what led to the Nov. 26 shooting, which authorities say took place in a botched robbery attempt at Taylor’s Miami home.
